data.name: Kirila_0
data.value: Was this structure being built because of the monster breaching event?

data.name: Flareon_0
data.value: Welcome to "Monster Museum", where the creatures from other dimensions exists to be showcased.

data.name: Flareon_1
data.value: Have Fun.

data.name: Sentret_0
data.value: Take a look at all these creatures. I'm wondering now if any of the species truly belong here, based on how they appear.

data.name: Mikon_0
data.value: Mikon, The Baby Fox Pokemon.

data.name: Mikon_1
data.value: Mikon was supposed to be a pre-evolution of Vulpix on the Spaceworld Demo

data.name: Mikon_2
data.value: Sadly, They were scrapped from the official games and remains lost in the world.

data.name: Flareon_Intro
data.value: Oh, Welcome!

data.name: PowPow_0
data.value: Pow-Pow, originated from Dungeon Village, by Kairosoft.

data.name: PowPow_1
data.value: They are weak but attacks with their sharp ears.

data.name: Mamel_0
data.value: Mamels are originated from Shiren The Wanderer Series.

data.name: Mamel_1
data.value: They're the first monsters encountered there.

data.name: Mamel_2
data.value: Because of that, They're pretty weak but their variants are stronger.

data.name: Shuilanlan_0
data.value: Shuilanlan, originated from Roco Kingdom, a Chinese game that draws inspiration from Pokemon.

data.name: Shuilanlan_1
data.value: They prefer to sleep underwater on the algae, and they can easily float in the water while spewing bubbles. They also have a wonderful ribbon tied around their head.

data.name: Gapori_0
data.value: The White Creature, originated from Gapporin/Pop'n Bounce.

data.name: Gapori_1
data.value: Because we didn't know their real name, we called them "Gapori".

data.name: Gapori_2
data.value: The creature has a puffball-like body and is little and spherical with blue eyes and flushed cheeks.

data.name: Gapori_3
data.value: Gapori has a long tail with a fuzzy tip and two feathered wings or ears on top of its head.

data.name: OhChan_0
data.value: Oh-Chan, one of Hebe's companion, originated from Hebereke/Ufouria.

data.name: OhChan_1
data.value: Sadly, not much is known about her at this time. But all we knew about her was that she had a overconfident personality and spat ice mist.

data.name: Notebeat_0
data.value: The notes creatures came from Beat Bubbles, a mini-game made by Ijji back in 2000s.

data.name: Notebeat_1
data.value: Here, We call them "Notebeats".

data.name: Notebeat_2
data.value: Notebeats are creatures with a strong concentration on music that march through the galaxy's arrows.

data.name: Hankuma_0
data.value: Those bear creatures wielding a hammer, originally came from Super Bomberman 4.

data.name: Hankuma_1
data.value: Owing to their official lack of name, we refer to them as "Hankuma".

data.name: Hankuma_2
data.value: The bombs can be changed into items with the use of their particular squeaking hammer.
